title: Y IS LOL CRASHNG?!
body: since yesterday, at the loading page lol keeps crashing. I reconnect but the same thing happens. Is there a way to fix this?!

replies.body: Could you attach an r3d log of the game you were crashing in? It's here: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs?

Digital Ram is spot on in his request.  An R3d log will help us investigate why these crashes are occurring.  Unfortunately, due to the beta, you are currently not able to attach files.  To that end, please submit a ticket to Player Support instead with this R3d Log file!  You can submit a ticket through this link:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new
